text: 2.19-20 Mat 15.14, 23.16-19, Luk 18.9, Jon 9.34, 9.40, Lom 6.17, 2 Ti 1.13, 3.5, 3.15 Pen gos chɨn teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, anɨb apɨm, Binɨb wɨdɨn koy tek mɨdebal okok kɨlop agñɨtep gɨl, poŋɨd amon kanɨb tep kɨdek gɨnɨgabal apɨm. Binɨb kɨsɨlɨm nab ayaŋ tek mɨdebal okok kɨlop agñɨtep gon, mɨlek sek yenɨgabal apɨm.
